TaskDescription.Detail: Recognize images in the login page and enter the ID twice.

Assist.value: Open a browser and access Daum.
The address of Daum login page is designated as a URL.
Click Run button below and open a browser.
Recognize the image of input field and enter the first ID.
After double-click the highlighted box, drag the whole input field of ID, and click where the cursor should be.
Specify a variable to be entered in the input field. Type this.firstID.
Recognize the image of input field and enter the second ID.
After double-click the highlighted box, drag the whole input field of ID, and click where the cursor should be.
Specify a variable to be entered in the input field. Type this.secondID.
This activity fails because the image of the input field will be changed after the first input. Set up what to do when an error occurs. Select --Ignore--.
Recognize the logo image that does not change and enter the first ID.
After double-click the highlighted box, drag the logo of DAUM, and click where the cursor should be.
Specify a variable to be entered in the input field. Type this.firstID.
Recognize the logo image that does not change and enter the second ID.
After double-click the highlighted box, drag the logo of DAUM, and click where the cursor should be.
Specify a variable to be entered in the input field. Type this.secondID.
